mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Miley, Michael, 1841-1918
mdRecord.dcterms:description: These pictures are portraits of A. S. Bolling. He is wearing the uniform of an Army Infantry lieutenant from World War I. Pose 1 is a standing, three-quarter portrait. Pose 2 is a seated pose showing head and shoulders. These prints were made from the original glass plate negatives, which are housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portraits of A. S. Bolling (photographs)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
